name: Scram
tagline: Small Complementary RnA Mapper : fast and simple collapsed small RNA read aligner and generator of publication-quality figures.
body:
# scram
Small Complementary RnA Mapper

Fast and simple collapsed small RNA read aligner and generator of publication-quality figures.

For usage: python ./scram.py -h
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
